files.description: Provides a single canonical function to resolve and create the pipeline output directory as repo-relative outputs/ by default with an optional environment variable override.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/output_paths.py
DIR_STATE:["src/determinism.py", "src/metrics.py", "src/output_paths.py", "src/results_schema.py", "src/run_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Added a canonical get_output_dir() helper that defaults to repo-relative ./outputs with an env var override and ensures the directory exists.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/output_paths.py
DIR_STATE:["src/determinism.py", "src/goal_33_toy_experiment.py", "src/metrics.py", "src/output_paths.py", "src/results_schema.py", "src/run_artifacts.py"]
Added a canonical output directory resolver that defaults to repo-relative ./outputs/ with an environment variable override and automatic directory creation.

files.description: Smoke test that runs the pipeline (or its output-writing entrypoint) and asserts expected artifacts are created under the canonical repo-relative outputs/ directory when no override is set.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:tests/test_outputs_smoke.py
DIR_STATE:["tests/test_artifacts.py", "tests/test_outputs_smoke.py", "tests/test_stability.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a pytest smoke test that asserts outputs default to repo-relative ./outputs/ with no environment override and that artifacts are created there.

FILE_WRITTEN:tests/test_outputs_smoke.py
DIR_STATE:["tests/test_artifacts.py", "tests/test_outputs_smoke.py", "tests/test_stability.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a smoke test ensuring outputs default to repo-relative ./outputs without environment overrides.

files.description: CI workflow that installs dependencies and runs the test suite to ensure output directory behavior stays portable across environments.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a GitHub Actions CI workflow that installs dependencies and runs pytest to enforce portable output-directory behavior.

FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a CI workflow that installs dependencies and runs pytest to validate portable repo-relative output directory behavior.

missionDescription: Standardize output writing so the pipeline never attempts absolute `/outputs` (permission issues reported) and instead writes to repo-relative `./outputs/` with an optional environment variable override; add a smoke test asserting outputs are created in the canonical directory.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Agent 17 reported `/outputs` was not writable and used `/mnt/data/outputs` + symlink; without standardization, reproducibility will fail across environments.
